typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,contract ERC20AddressTracker[] memory) returns (contract ERC20AddressTracker[] memory)

params.completeHash: hash of [longitude, latitude, address_line_1, address_line_2, all residents, owner]

params._authority: address of account to be made issuing authority.

params._govtAddress: Account to be set as the government address

params.newHash: new hash of [longitude, latitude, address_line_1, address_line_2, all residents, owner]
params.oldHash: old hash of [longitude, latitude, address_line_1, address_line_2, all residents, owner]

allot(bytes32,bytes32,address).notice: This function allot a token to the owner of the location.

methods.constructor: Constructor for the AddressTracker This function sets initialise addressSet to false

getGovtAddress().notice: getter function to get the government address

issueAuthorisation(address).notice: This function make an account eligible for minting tokens. Only government is allowed to make new issuing authorities.

mintToken(bytes32).notice: This function mints a token for a given location Only issuing authorities are allowed to mint tokens

setGovtAddress(address).notice: This function sets the government address government address is pushed to authorities array

transfer(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,address.notice: This function transfers the ownership of land. The owner can tranfer the ownership by providing correct details
